title: Leicester City news: Claudio Ranieri sacking has fans in meltdown | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 8:21 pm Claudio Ranieri led Leicester to the most unlikely of title triumphs (Picture: Getty) 
Just nine months after the unbelievable feat of winning Leicester City the Premier League title, Claudio Ranieri has been sensationally sacked by the club after a poor run of form. 
The Italian tactician captured the imagination of the footballing world last season as his Foxes side overcame odds of 5000/1 to be crowned champions of England for the first time in their history. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
Widely expected to go down as one of the greatest sporting achievements of all time, Ranieri’s remarkable work has counted for little in his favour this season as his side slipped down the table . 
Leicester are now just a point above the relegation zone, and have won only one of their last nine games in all competitions. 
Still, football romantics can’t quite believe how ruthless the club have been in their handling of the situation, and have laid into Leicester for bringing a true footballing fairytale to a sad end… Claudio Ranieri? Sacked? Really? Dilly Ding Dilly Game's Gone.
